examples: By that point in the argument, reason had gone out the window.
I fully understand the reason for your decision.
She's got no reason to give herself airs and graces.
If you went through channels, then they have no reason to turn you away.
Up until now, I have kept my own counsel about my reasons for leaving the Department of Justice.
words.defineEn: something that explains an action or event
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó giải thích một hành động hoặc sự kiện

examples: So it makes sense to draw a distinction between the constant changing of nature’s seasons, versus the eternality of lines of poetry.

Trying to understand relativity just by using basic equations for time dilation and length contraction (like is often done in beginning physics classes) will often lead to confusing apparent contradictions, because they don't take into account the full changing of simultaneity of events, and so on.

So in a fruit or vegetable with conventional breeding, you know, you have a mother and a father and the children are always a combination, but what happens if you could actually just change one of the traits and not have to go through all the changing of everything?
words.defineEn: continuously converting, modifying, evolving, or becoming different
words.defineVi: liên tục chuyển đổi, sửa đổi, phát triển hoặc trở nên khác biệt

examples: I planned a surprise party for my little sister's birthday.
She planned a romantic candlelit meal for their anniversary.
They are planning a movie night at the movie theater with their family.
The plan ran into a brick wall.
The closing of the airport knocked our holiday plans on the head.
words.defineEn: a chain of actions that will help us reach our goals
words.defineVi: một chuỗi các hành động sẽ giúp chúng tôi đạt được mục tiêu của mình

words.defineEn: to earn an amount of money that enables one to support oneself and pay for one's needs
words.defineVi: để kiếm được một số tiền cho phép một người hỗ trợ bản thân và trả tiền cho nhu cầu của một người

examples: The day and night passed slowly.
The feeling of sickness soon passed.
Unemployment has now passed the three million mark.
words.defineEn: to get the necessary grades in an exam, test, course, etc.
words.defineVi: để đạt điểm cần thiết trong một kỳ thi, bài kiểm tra, khóa học, v.v.

words.defineEn: to advise someone against doing something
words.defineVi: để khuyên ai đó chống lại làm điều gì đó

words.phonetic: tə tʃeɪndʒ wʌn bækslæʃ ɛs maɪnd
words.defineEn: to change one's opinion or decision regarding something
words.defineVi: để thay đổi ý kiến hoặc quyết định của một người về một cái gì đó
